text: allah ovunta laba di tibunu elu, gava, otuvan mata ohuge namaya kiyavana men sælæsvima sandahama sæma samuhayakatama kurban kirima api anivaryaya yutukamak bavata pat kara tibunemu. ebævin obage deviyan (ekama) ekkeneki. ohu ek kenekuvama oba sampurnayen avanata vi katayutu karanu. abhyantara biya æti ayata (nabiye!) oba subharamci denu mænava
